title: Detective.Intro.Monologue
body:
...
Damn it, I fell asleep at my desk again.
->I really shouldn't work so late.
    That last case was a hard one.
    <<startPhoneRing IntroEventSystem>>
    Great. What now?
->I shouldn't drink so much.
    <<startPhoneRing IntroEventSystem>>
    OH GOD MY HEAD!
    Damn it, who's calling me?
->Well, it's better than staying at home.
    <<startPhoneRing IntroEventSystem>>
    Hopefully that's not them calling...
